episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/4001_1001_0: Crasher Wake is the coolest! Go, master!
Nu-uh! The Masked Royal’s definitely cooler!

Oh boy, here we go again. A heated debate from
the audience...
So, Penny! Who do you think’s cooler?
episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/6801_1001_0:
Pasio’s the perfect place to work on what’s
important to me!

Here, there are strong Trainers who hone their
skills—and people dedicated to the same things
as me.

I plan to enjoy life on Pasio just as much as I did
in school in Paldea!
episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/4002_1001_0: Hey! That there! That was a good move!
You mind telling us your name?

I’m a Trainer from Paldea, and I love
pro wrestling!
Let’s give a warm welcome to our new friend, Eri!
episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/4002_1001_1: I wasn’t expecting you to crash the show, Eri.
We actually invited her to join our match.

During a battle earlier, we noticed her talent
immediately.
She has incredible potential as a wrestler.

And a real passion for it, too! We could sense her
burning spirit!

That’s why we asked her to bring some extra
energy to our match!

Plus, I’d love to learn more from you—from your
perspectives as wrestlers AND as people with such
amazing life experiences!
Wow, you’re really going for it, Eri...

Oh, by the way! I didn’t know you were interested
in pro wrestling, Penny!
episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/4002_1001_2:
If you want to learn more, I can teach you
some things!

Um... Well, I wouldn’t say I’m a fan of pro
wrestling specifically.

I just came to watch because it reminds me
of a superhero show.
Yeah, Penny’s a huge hero fan!
She talks about them all the time!
Happy to see you’ve made new friends, Penny!
You seem to be enjoying life on Pasio!
Um, well, I guess... I’d say it’s not too bad.
Oh, but there is a problem I want to solve.
episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/4003_1101_0:
Penny and the others told Eri about their plan to
establish Pasio Academy.
episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/4003_1001_0: Sounds like a great idea. What’s the problem?

Well, some people aren’t as excited about it as
we expected.

They’re saying things like, “Do we really need a
school on Pasio?” and “I don’t wanna study.”

Well, I suppose not everyone has fond memories
of learning.

What should we do if no one wants to join and
we have no students?

I guess we’ve no choice but to keep reaching
out to people!
episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/4003_1001_1:
I see. So this is the problem you were
talking about.

I’ll reach out to a bunch of people and hype them
up about our new school!
episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/4004_1101_0: Eri was once again participating in a match.
episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/4004_1001_0:
Thanks to everyone’s support, we had a great
match today!

Before we wrap up, Eri has something she wants
to share!

Do you all know about the school that’s going to
be built on Pasio?

Pasio is already an amazing place where
sync pairs can connect and interact.

But imagine how much more exciting it’d be if
we had a school!
We could make more friends and learn so much!
episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/4004_1001_1:
So, I just wanted to say, let’s all come together to
make this school happen!
episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/4005_1001_0: I wonder how it’ll turn out.

Pasio Academy will be built by everyone on Pasio
working together!
Um, Professor... Is your Incineroar OK?

We hit him with a pretty strong move yesterday,
so...

A-are you asking about the Masked Royal’s
Incineroar?
episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/4005_1001_1:
Huh? Y-yeah. I was worried, so I came to ask
you...

I heard the Masked Royal asked YOU to look after
his Incineroar... Ahaha!
Ah, I see! That explains it!

Aaanyway, I overheard you talking about the
new school—

Hey, about that new school they’re planning to
build on Pasio...
Oh! They’re talking about it, too!
Sounds like it’s on everyone’s mind!
Honestly, I don’t really care if they build one.
episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/4005_1001_2:
I mean, if people want to attend, no one’s
stopping them.
Yeah... I’m not really that smart.

And I’m worried no one’ll wanna hang out with
me if I can’t keep up in class.

It must be nice to not have to worry about stuff
like that.

Oh, like the person who was all like,
“Let’s all go to school,” right?
Yeah. Easy for HER to say...

She probably doesn’t even know what it’s like to
be weak. I bet she’s always been fawned over
for being so strong...
...Is that really how I come across?
episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/4006_1001_0:
It’s not safe to lose focus when you’re training,
you know!
Is that Pasio Academy on your mind?

I’ve been trying to figure out how to get everyone
on board with it.
Hmm. I don’t think there’s an easy solution.

When you start something new, it’s normal to
encounter obstacles.

Have you had a similar experience,
Professor Kukui?
episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/4006_1001_1:
Yeah, I faced some struggles when I established
the Pokémon League in Alola.

I love the Alola region, and I always wanted to
see it produce a world-class Champion.

So I had to start from the ground up.
It wasn’t easy.

I even went to the Pokémon League in Kanto to
soak up all the knowledge I could.

I thought about how I could weave Alolan
traditions into things, and all kinds of ideas came
to mind...

I see. And after all that effort, you finally made
it happen.

Thanks so much for sharing! I won’t hold back
anymore. I know exactly what I need to do!

I don’t know what you took from all that, or what
you’re planning...

but please tell me you’re not thinking of making
a martyr of yourself.
episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/4006_1001_2:
(But it’s the only way I can think of to bring
everyone together!)
episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/4007_1001_0: So, what do you wanna talk about, Eri?

Yeah! I’ve made up my mind and want to share
my idea with you two.

So, I’m thinking that if we want everyone to come
together on this, we need a strong motivator!
Remember how it motivated us before?

Our anger about all the bullying is what brought
Team Star together.
So, that’s why I think I should play the villain!
episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/4007_1001_1:
Like a heel in pro wrestling. There’s always gotta
be a bad guy to take down, right?

Let me think... Oh, maybe I could pretend to be a
really mean honor student.

Everyone will want to come to school just to show
me up!

Everyone’s working tirelessly to set up the school,
so it’s no big deal—

I don’t want my friend to be misunderstood
and hated!
Even if you’re OK with that, I’m NOT!
episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/4007_1001_2: Yeah, I don’t like it, either.
You don’t need to shoulder all the burden, Eri.

Besides, have you forgotten what happened when
we all acted out of anger?

We don’t want to put the Pasio Academy students
through the same ordeal we went through as
Team Star.
I guess I was letting myself run wild, huh.
It’s OK! As long as you understand!
Let’s think of a better idea together!

So I think our explanation needs to be a bit more
specific.
episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/4007_1001_3:
We should mention things like why we need a
school and how it can be fun.
It’s better to be sincere than to pull tricks, right?
Be fair and honorable, like a good Pokémon battle!
Just like how you battle, Eri!
Yup, and it suits you better.

Let’s be open and honest with everyone about
how we feel!
episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/4008_1001_0:
We’ve got you cornered! The next hit will
end this!
...And it’s now time for a quiz!

Pokémon attack moves can be divided into two
categories!

Correct! And to share a bit of advice: it’s
important to make your strong points stronger—
that goes for both people and Pokémon!
episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/4008_1001_1: Physical moves—it can imbue its fists with power!

Hahaha! You’ve still a long way to go if you let
someone make a comeback like that!

That last blow shows how well you bring out
your partner’s strength! Well done, Eri!
Is that the result of your daily training?
...Or did you learn it through battling?

Actually, the reason I was able to get out of that
pinch...
was my knowledge gained at Paldea’s academy!
So it’s all thanks to school, huh?
episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/4008_1001_2:
Exactly! I learned so much there with my friends—
while having a great time together!

But actually, I only started going back to school
very recently.
I refused to go for a while.
All because I was being bullied at that academy.
Huh? Bullied? Even though she’s so strong?

But I overcame the bullying with the help of
my friends.

I know school isn’t always fun. At the time, I was
so sad and frustrated.

But looking back, I can confidently say I’m glad
I went!
episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/4008_1001_3:
If you just want to study, then maybe you don’t
really need school.

But school provides a space where you can
learn and grow alongside others.

You’ll have fun times, treasured moments,
challenges, and setbacks...

Your precious time at school can lead to so many
good things!

We’re who we are today because of our time
at school.

I had once-in-a-lifetime experiences—and met
friends who helped me when I was in trouble.

Those are the “treasures” I gained from the
academy!
I want Pasio Academy to be that for others!
In fact, I’ll make sure it is!
episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/4008_1001_4:
Let’s create a school together from scratch—and
make it a place everyone will enjoy!

A place where you can learn from both good
and bad...

I guess there are things we’ll never know until
we go.
(Eri... Your words resonate with me, too!)
episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/4009_1001_0:
I’d like a place in the school where students and
Pokémon can go totally wild.

Somewhere that’s spacious—like a gymnasium or
a field!
I think we can manage that.
All right, then! Let’s head off to our training!

It may only be a few at a time, but this school is
gaining supporters.

That’s largely due to Eri and the others proactively
reaching out to everyone.

A school founded by the students themselves will
definitely be a wonderful place.
episode_event_ch0330_00_biwa/4009_1001_1: I look forward to its opening.
